article_title: Google charts how the pandemic has changed New Brunswickers' routines
article_description: Google released charts that appear to show how New Brunswickers are changing their routines as a result of the pandemic  Google says the information is meant to help governments gauge the effectiveness of measures to control the spread of the novel coronaviru
article_content: Google released charts that appear to show how the routines of New Brunswickers have changed as a result of the pandemic The company published charts Friday   comparing recent traffic at locations  such as grocery stores  to traffic during the month of Jan   5504 chars
